Resource

Other

  • https://datastudio.google.com/u/0/

R Packages

  • ROpenSci Universe: The ROpenSci list of packages includes many that facilitate access to interesting datasets.

  • Programming

    • skimr: Quick summary statistics.
    • charlatan: Make fake data, e.g., names.
    • bibtex: Parse a .bib file. (Might be useful for this website. There are other related packages, e.g., handlr.)
    • parzer: Parse messy latitudes and longitudes.

  • Weather

    • weathercan: R package to get ECCC weather data.
    • GSODR: One of a few packages for downloading Global Summary of the Day weather data.
    • rnoaa: Client for many NOAA data sources.
    • stationaRy: Hourly weather data from around the world.
    • prism: Access prism data.
    • Chirps and Chirts: Global reanalysis weather data, 1983-2016.

  • Disasters

    • rrricanes: Hurricane data since 1998.

  • Pollution

    • epair: Help with parsing various EPA datasets.

  • Imagery

    • rsat: Search, download, and process satellite imagery from several free sources.
    • rnaturalearth: Natural earth imagery for mapping.

  • Transport

    • bikedata: Public bicycle data.

  • Spatial

    • geonames: Access geonames.org API to get geography names.
This page is built with ❤️ (and Quarto).
